result.markdown: --- title: "ratlas" author: - Jake Thompson - Noelle Pablo - Jeffrey Hoover date: 2020-01-29 slug: ratlas image: featured.jpg alias: - /project/ratlas/ categories: - R - package - ggplot2 - R Markdown description: "ATLAS formatting functions and templates" abstract: '' engine: knitr links: - icon: globe name: website url: https://ratlas.netlify.app - icon: github name: code url: https://github.com/atlas-aai/ratlas --- ## ratlas ratlas is an *R* package that provides the infrastructure for reproducible reporting writing with Accessible Teaching, Learning, and Assessment Systems (ATLAS) at the University of Kansas. Included are various R Markdown templates for generating reports, custom ggplot2 themes, and miscellaneous helper functions for matting numbers, text, and tables. This package may be used as an example for creating a similar package within other organizations.
